search.query: | rest /servicesNS/nobody/GoogleDriveAddonforSplunk/storage/passwords `listcourseworksubmission("$realm$", "$courseId$", "$courseWorkId$")` | join userId [| rest /servicesNS/nobody/GoogleDriveAddonforSplunk/storage/passwords `liststudents("$realm$", "$courseId$")`] | eval "Grade Percent"=(pointsEarned/maxPoints)*100 | fillnull value=0 "Grade Percent"

| eval turned_in_epoch = strptime(turned_in_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%T.%3NZ") | eval created_epoch = strptime(creationTime, "%Y-%m-%dT%T.%3NZ") | eval turn_in_days=(turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60/60/24 | eval turn_in_hours=(turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60/60 | eval turn_in_minutes=(turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60 | eval courseWorkId="$courseWorkId$" | stats max(turn_in_days) as "Maximum Days" avg(turn_in_days) as "Average Days" min(turn_in_days) as "Minimum Days" max(turn_in_hours) as "Maximum Hours" avg(turn_in_hours) as "Average Hours" min(turn_in_hours) as "Minimum Hours" max(turn_in_minutes) as "Maximum Minutes" avg(turn_in_minutes) as "Average Minutes" min(turn_in_minutes) as "Minimum Minutes" | fields + *$format$* | transpose | rename "row 1" as "Assignment"

| eval turned_in_epoch = strptime(turned_in_time, "%Y-%m-%dT%T.%3NZ") | eval created_epoch = strptime(creationTime, "%Y-%m-%dT%T.%3NZ") | eval "Turn In Days"=(turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60/60/24 | eval "Turn In Hours"=round((turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60/60,0) | eval "Turn In Minutes"=round((turned_in_epoch-created_epoch)/60,0) | sort 0 - "Turn In $format$" | fields + FullName *$format$*
| stats max("Grade Percent") as "Maximum Grade" avg("Grade Percent") as "Average Grade" min("Grade Percent") as "Minimum Grade" | transpose | rename "row 1" as "Assignment"
